reviews.text: It is a good lager beer, not like the watery light beers, it has its own borgio taste from 1924, mongolian first lager

Good beer with good german style lager taste. It is hard to tell much difference in lagers, but from appearance and meaning of its label has a history to the city it is produced. Niislel means capital city in english, so to drink this in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia is a must.
